title: Assassins.Creed.Unity.v1.5.Update.STATEMENT-SKIDROW
description:
Assassin's Creed Unity v1.5 Update STATEMENT - SKiDROW
------------------------------------------------------

21-02-2015......Release Date  Protection...........Ubisoft DRM
Action.............Game Type  Disk(s)......................DOX


STATEMENT

Assassins.Creed.Unity.Update.v1.5.Proper-RELOADED... is not a valid
proper reason. Guessing/made up/hoping/wishing reasons are not accepted
as being valid. Do you think nukers/siteop are that stupid? apparently!

Sceners listen - the stupidity will apparently never stop!

REBLOWED are going down the drain. Instead of competing with scene
quality release, REBLOWED leadership have decided to start a vendetta
on our Assassins Creed Unity releases, but also on team, sister groups
and friends

We will not comment about the REBLOWED Assassins Creed Unity releases
but just want to refer to our own previously released Assassins Creed
Unity releases and thier nfos

Dear REBLOWED leadership

Proper us, if you got something worth a proper. And stop trolling
around too many russian forums, because your imagination has started to
play around with your mind

We won fair and square - live with it!


RELEASE NOTES

Read changelog.txt for information on updated content!


INSTALL NOTES

1. Unpack release
2. Run Assassins.Creed.Unity.v1.5.Update.exe
3. Install
4. Copy everything from the SKIDROW folder into the game installation
5. Block the game in your firewall and mark our cracked content as
   secure/trusted in your antivirus program
6. Play the game
7. Support the companies, which software you actually enjoy!


ADDITIONAL NOTES

This update require our initial full game release, dlc and update v1.4
installed!


GREETINGS

To all friends of the family and honorable rival groups!
